TopicTitle: With the close of the RP forums, I'd like to propose an idea.

Articles.Content:
Now that we\'ll have a new forum and we aren\'t supposed to have wars, I have a plan that I\'d like to see how you guys take it. I think we should work together in allied space factions to achieve all kinds of new goals with recognition, funding etc. for our accomplishments. Afterall, this is Kerbal SPACE program. I think we should have a bunch of space agencies that anyone can join. No wars, no battles, no grudges. We will of course have budgets and other obstacles, but this would add a whole new thing to the game.

I don\'t intend to have any particular leader for this, but I would like to start my own space program while this post is going up. I don\'t have a name yet, but I can probably take 30 people right off the bat. Then others could make their own space programs. By this time next month, we\'ll have entire cities built on Minmus.

Let me know what you guys think. And remember, we\'re supposed to avoid any tension or fighting.
He already said they would make a fan works board, sooo.
I know he said that. That\'s why I\'m proposing it is where we make our network of space programs.

Hmm. Almost like completing challenges, in groups (corps?)

I might just stick around for that.
I hope it would be democratic/ all programs working together.
Of course it would. Our sole purpose as agencies is the conquest and civilization of space and the solar system of Kerbal Space Program.
That wont happen now that radion set his own RP forum up,that has wars.

I noticed that a lot of spacecraft creations and discussions on this forum involve war and weaponizing vehicles. It\'s kind of saddening, the real US space program took a back seat to war and defense, and it looks like that\'s happening here too, but fictional and on a smaller scale. Personally, I\'m looking forward to an RP board that isn\'t full of violence and warmongering. The point of KSP is exploration, not waging war against anyone you don\'t agree with. That\'s what real politics are for.

The space race was caused by a threat of war.

> 
> The space race was caused by a threat of war.

That\'s how it\'s always going to be, then. Humans are a destructive, violent species. If war and violence is the only thing that our existence will amount to, then... well, that\'s just depressing, honestly.
Well, you won\'t be seeing much warmongering on the new RP forum. I\'ve set in several new regulations to prevent such occurrences, making it better for nations to cooperate than to kill each other.

I prefer the pursuit of science and technology, for the betterment of kerbalkind. Maybe we lose some kerbals in the process, but you don\'t make a better rocket without breaking others.

Now let\'s do some science, you monsters.

I may have a name for my space agency to start the whole conquest of space in its entirety.

National Space Exploration Association.

NSEA. (En-See)

I have a few people I\'d like to invite to work in chief positions, but I will contact them privately. I encourage everyone to start an agency! When the new boards launch, the exploring is on!

If anybody would like to sign up for my agency or work to make good ideas happen, feel free. Nobody is left out!
